attributes.action: Make parking at work permanently free for all NHS workers
attributes.additional_details: Our Government needs to step up and give something back to our NHS workers, the cost of living is already sky rocketing. Let’s save our nations heroes from at least one expense.
attributes.background: The Government should provide the funding necessary to ensure that parking at their place of work is free for all NHS workers. It is unacceptable that people who are working to save lives and care for the sick have to pay to park their car at work.
